hero.title: Global Logistics Solutions for Modern Business
hero.subtitle: BRL Global delivers seamless freight forwarding and logistics services across sea, air, and land. We connect businesses worldwide with reliable, efficient shipping solutions.

services.title: Our Services

oceanFreight.title: Ocean Freight
oceanFreight.description: Reliable ocean freight solutions for your global shipping needs. FCL and LCL services available.

airFreight.title: Air Freight

groundTransport.title: Ground Transport
groundTransport.description: Comprehensive ground transportation solutions for domestic and cross-border shipping.
